column7: The Good The Bad & The Ugly
column8: Released in 1966, The Good The Bad & The Ugly was the third and final film in the Dollars trilogy (A Fist Full Of Dollars & For A Few Dollars More came before it) - starring Clint Eastwood and directed by Sergio Leone. At first it was criticised for its violence, Leone's response to this was "the killings in my films are exaggerated because I wanted to make a tongue-in-cheek satire on run-of-the-mill westerns... The west was made by violent, uncomplicated men, and it is this strength and simplicity that I try to recapture in my pictures".

column20: The Good The Bad & The Ugly
column21: Released in 1966, The Good The Bad & The Ugly was the third and final film in the Dollars trilogy (A Fist Full Of Dollars & For A Few Dollars More came before it) - starring Clint Eastwood and directed by Sergio Leone. Show it some love with this t shirt from weadmire.net.
